languages.text: {n}Эдельтрад издает разъяренный рев фанатика-безумца.{/n} "Я не буду гибнуть без дела рядом с {mf|тем|той}, кто предал{mf||а} свой род. Если последнее, чем я послужу Империуму — это разорву горло врагу Человечества... значит, на то воля Бога-Императора!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Эдельтрад издает разъяренный рев фанатика-безумца.{/n} "Я не буду гибнуть без дела рядом с {mf|тем|той}, кто предал свой род. Если последнее, чем я послужу Империуму — это разорву горло врагу Человечества... значит, на то воля Бога-Императора!"

languages.text: {n}Edelthrad roars with mad, fanatical rage.{/n} "I will not die quietly alongside one who is a traitor to {mf|his|her} blood! If my last service to the Imperium is to rip out the throat of an enemy of Humanity... then such is the God-Emperor's will!"
languages.original_text: {n}Эдельтрад издает разъяренный рев фанатика-безумца.{/n} "Я не буду гибнуть без дела рядом с {mf|тем|той}, кто предал{mf||а} свой род. Если последнее, чем я послужу Империуму — это разорву горло врагу Человечества... значит, на то воля Бога-Императора!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Edelthrad roars with mad, fanatical rage.{/n} "I shall not stand side by side with one who has betrayed {mf|his|her} blood! If the last thing I do in life is put an end to the deeds of an enemy of Humanity... then such is the God-Emperor's will!"

{n}Edelthrad roars with mad, fanatical rage.{/n} "I shall not stand side by side with one who has betrayed {mf|his|her} blood! If the last thing I do in life is put an end to the deeds of an enemy of Humanity... then such is the God-Emperor's will!"

{n}Edelthrad roars with mad, fanatical rage.{/n} "I shall not stand side by side with one who has betrayed {mf|his|her} blood! If the last thing I do in life is put an end to the deeds of an enemy of Humanity... then such is the God-Emperor's will!"

{n}Edelthrad roars with mad, fanatical rage.{/n} "I shall not stand side by side with one who has betrayed {mf|his|her} blood! If the last thing I do in life is put an end to the deeds of an enemy of Humanity... then such is the God-Emperor's will!"

{n}Edelthrad roars with mad, fanatical rage.{/n} "I shall not die idly side by side with one who has betrayed {mf|his|her} blood! If the last thing I do to serve the Imperium is to rip out the throat of an enemy of Humanity... then such is the God-Emperor's will!"

{n}Edelthrad roars with mad, fanatical rage.{/n} "I will not die quietly alongside one who is a traitor to {mf|his|her} blood! If my last service to the Imperium is to rip out the throat of an enemy of Humanity... then such is the God-Emperor's will!"

{n}Edelthrad roars with mad, fanatical rage.{/n} "I will not die quietly alongside one who is a traitor to {mf|his|her} blood! If my last service to the Imperium is to rip out the throat of an enemy of Humanity... then such is the God-Emperor's will!"

languages.text: {n}エデルスラドは怒りと狂信的な激昂した声で咆哮する。{/n}「フォン・ヴァランシウスの血を裏切る者と共にみすみす死ぬつもりはない！もし私が捧げる帝国への最期の奉仕が人類の敵の喉を食い破ることなら…これぞ神帝陛下の御意志に違いない！」
languages.original_text: {n}Edelthrad roars with mad, fanatical rage.{/n} "I will not die quietly alongside one who is a traitor to {mf|his|her} blood! If my last service to the Imperium is to rip out the throat of an enemy of Humanity... then such is the God-Emperor's will!"

traits.locale_text: {n}エデルスラドは怒りと狂信ゆえ、激昂した声で咆哮する。{/n}「フォン・ヴァランシウスの血を裏切る者と共にみすみす死ぬつもりはない！私ができる〈帝国〉への最期の奉仕が人類の敵の喉を食い破ることなら…これぞ神帝陛下の御意志！」
{n}エデルスラドは怒りと狂信的な激昂した声で咆哮する。{/n}「フォン・ヴァランシウスの血を裏切る者と共にみすみす死ぬつもりはない！もし私が捧げる帝国への最期の奉仕が人類の敵の喉を食い破ることなら…これぞ神帝陛下の御意志に違いない！」

languages.text: {n}艾德萨德疯狂地大叫起来。{/n}“我绝不会一声不吭，与背弃自己种族的叛徒死在一起！如果撕开人类之敌的咽喉就是我对帝国最后的贡献……那么我将贯彻神皇的旨意！”
languages.original_text: {n}Edelthrad roars with mad, fanatical rage.{/n} "I will not die quietly alongside one who is a traitor to {mf|his|her} blood! If my last service to the Imperium is to rip out the throat of an enemy of Humanity... then such is the God-Emperor's will!"

traits.locale_text: {n}艾德萨德疯狂地大叫起来。{/n}“我绝不会一声不吭，与背弃自己种族的叛徒死在一起！如果撕开人类之敌的咽喉就是我对帝国最后的贡献……那么我将贯彻神皇的旨意！”

languages.text: {n}Edelthrad rugit sous l'effet d'une rage folle.{/n} « Je ne mourrai pas silencieusement aux côtés d'{mf|un traître|une traîtresse} à son propre sang ! Si l'Imperium exige de moi que je me sacrifie pour arracher la gorge d'un ennemi de l'humanité... il en sera fait conformément à la volonté de l'Empereur-Dieu ! »
languages.original_text: {n}Edelthrad roars with mad, fanatical rage.{/n} "I will not die quietly alongside one who is a traitor to {mf|his|her} blood! If my last service to the Imperium is to rip out the throat of an enemy of Humanity... then such is the God-Emperor's will!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Edelthrad rugit sous l'effet d'une rage folle.{/n} « Je ne mourrai pas silencieusement aux côtés d'{mf|un traître|une traîtresse} à son propre sang ! Si l'Imperium exige de moi que je me sacrifie pour arracher la gorge d'un ennemi de l'humanité... il en sera fait conformément à la volonté de l'Empereur-Dieu ! »

languages.text: {n}Edelthrad schreit vor wahnsinnigem, fanatischem Zorn.{/n} "Ich werde nicht einfach schweigend neben {mf|einem Verräter an seinem|einer Verräterin an ihrem} eigenen Blut sterben! Wenn es mein letzter Dienst am Imperium sein soll, einem Feind der Menschheit die Kehle herauszureißen ... dann ist das der Wille des Gottimperators!"
languages.original_text: {n}Edelthrad roars with mad, fanatical rage.{/n} "I will not die quietly alongside one who is a traitor to {mf|his|her} blood! If my last service to the Imperium is to rip out the throat of an enemy of Humanity... then such is the God-Emperor's will!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Edelthrad schreit vor wahnsinnigem, fanatischem Zorn.{/n} "Ich werde nicht einfach schweigend neben {mf|einem Verräter an seinem|einer Verräterin an ihrem} eigenen Blut sterben! Wenn es mein letzter Dienst am Imperium sein soll, einem Feind der Menschheit die Kehle herauszureißen ... dann ist das der Wille des Gottimperators!"

languages.text: {n}Edelthrad ruge con una rabia enloquecida y fanática.{/n} «¡No moriré sin pena ni gloria con {mf|un traidor|una traidora} a su estirpe! Si mi último deber para con el Imperium es degollar a un enemigo de la Humanidad... ¡tal es la voluntad del Dios Emperador!».
languages.original_text: {n}Edelthrad roars with mad, fanatical rage.{/n} "I will not die quietly alongside one who is a traitor to {mf|his|her} blood! If my last service to the Imperium is to rip out the throat of an enemy of Humanity... then such is the God-Emperor's will!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Edelthrad ruge con una rabia enloquecida y fanática.{/n} «¡No moriré sin pena ni gloria con {mf|un traidor|una traidora} a su estirpe! Si mi último deber para con el Imperium es degollar a un enemigo de la Humanidad... ¡tal es la voluntad del Dios Emperador!».

languages.text: {n}Edelthrad çılgınca, kontrolsüz bir öfkeyle haykırıyor.{/n} "Soyuna ihanet edenin yanında sessiz sedasız ölmem ben! Tanrı İmparator'un bana çizdiği kader buysa İmparatorluk'a son hizmetim İnsanlığın düşmanının boğazını sökmek olsun!"
languages.original_text: {n}Edelthrad roars with mad, fanatical rage.{/n} "I will not die quietly alongside one who is a traitor to {mf|his|her} blood! If my last service to the Imperium is to rip out the throat of an enemy of Humanity... then such is the God-Emperor's will!"
